game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: You've heard rumors that a powerful artifact is buried deep within the forgotten ruins. Your quest is to locate and retrieve it, but be cautious - danger lurks around every corner.
game.reward: 1000 experience points and a magical relic

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the ruins
task.description: You must discover the hidden entrance to the ruins before you can begin your search for the artifact.
A fierce guardian beast protects the artifact. You must defeat it to proceed.
